headline.main: Ivorian Opposition Coalition Threatens to Obstruct Elections
headline.print_headline: Ivorian Opposition Coalition Threatens to Obstruct Elections

docs.snippet: A coalition of opposition groups in Ivory Coast threatened on Monday to try to block presidential elections in October unless the government opens talks on issues such as insecurity and the electoral commission....
docs.lead_paragraph: A coalition of opposition groups in Ivory Coast threatened on Monday to try to block presidential elections in October unless the government opens talks on issues such as insecurity and the electoral commission.

headline.main: Altice Hires Senior Telecom Specialist From Alcatel-Lucent
headline.print_headline: Altice Hires Senior Telecom Specialist From Alcatel-Lucent

docs.snippet: Telecoms group Altice has named long-serving sector executive Michel Combes as its chief operating officer and chairman of its Numericable-SFR mobile phone business, saying the appointment would help accelerate the group's expansion....
docs.lead_paragraph: Telecoms group Altice has named long-serving sector executive Michel Combes as its chief operating officer and chairman of its Numericable-SFR mobile phone business, saying the appointment would help accelerate the group's expansion.

headline.main: Manchester United's Januzaj Joins Dortmund on Loan
headline.print_headline: Manchester United's Januzaj Joins Dortmund on Loan

docs.snippet: Borussia Dortmund have signed Manchester United's Adnan Januzaj on loan for a season, the German club said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund have signed Manchester United's Adnan Januzaj on loan for a season, the German club said on Monday.

headline.main: Ukrainian Kids Go to Military Camp
headline.print_headline: Ukrainian Kids Go to Military Camp

docs.snippet: More than 100 Ukrainian schoolchildren will have unusual tales to tell their mates when classes resume, after spending part of their summer vacations undergoing training by the National Guard....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 100 Ukrainian schoolchildren will have unusual tales to tell their mates when classes resume, after spending part of their summer vacations undergoing training by the National Guard.

headline.main: Carlyle Group to Buy Candle Seller Blyth for $98 Million
headline.print_headline: Carlyle Group to Buy Candle Seller Blyth for $98 Million

docs.snippet: The Carlyle Group will pay $98 million to buy candle seller Blyth, the private equity firm said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Carlyle Group will pay $98 million to buy candle seller Blyth, the private equity firm said Monday.

headline.main: Merkel Says Would Welcome Constructive Iranian Role in Any Syria Talks
headline.print_headline: Merkel Says Would Welcome Constructive Iranian Role in Any Syria Talks

docs.snippet: Germany would welcome Iran's participation in any negotiations aimed at ending the civil war in Syria, Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany would welcome Iran's participation in any negotiations aimed at ending the civil war in Syria, Chancellor Angela Merkel said on Monday.

headline.main: Draxler Leaves Schalke for Wolfsburg in Record Deal
headline.print_headline: Draxler Leaves Schalke for Wolfsburg in Record Deal

docs.snippet: Germany international Julian Draxler has left his home club Schalke 04 after 14 years to join VfL Wolfsburg on a five-year contract in a record transfer for the Ruhr valley club, Schalke sports director Horst Heldt said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Germany international Julian Draxler has left his home club Schalke 04 after 14 years to join VfL Wolfsburg on a five-year contract in a record transfer for the Ruhr valley club, Schalke sports director Horst Heldt said on Monday.

headline.main: Google Tries to Woo iPhone Owners With Android Watch App
headline.print_headline: Google Tries to Woo iPhone Owners With Android Watch App

docs.snippet: Google is introducing an application that will connect Android smartwatches with Apple's iPhone, escalating the rivals' battle to strap their technology on people's wrists....
docs.lead_paragraph: Google is introducing an application that will connect Android smartwatches with Apple's iPhone, escalating the rivals' battle to strap their technology on people's wrists.

headline.main: $20 Found in San Francisco Leads to $1 Million Lottery Win
headline.print_headline: $20 Found in San Francisco Leads to $1 Million Lottery Win

docs.snippet: A San Francisco Bay Area man won $1 million in the California Lottery after buying a winning ticket with money he found at the airport....
docs.lead_paragraph: A San Francisco Bay Area man won $1 million in the California Lottery after buying a winning ticket with money he found at the airport.
